name: Go Speak English Ltd
tag_list: english, english-language, english-teachers, english-language-exchange, english-conversation, business-english, english-online, english-lessons-via-skype, interpreters, translators, students, language-schools, english-networking, sign-language, asl, bsl,
overview:
The Go Speak English website helps students, companies, teachers, interpreters, translators, and language schools to connect with each other.

Many people all over the world speak some English, however, the English language is spoken in many different countries and cities, with many different accents. This makes the understanding of different accents difficult for all of us; even for native speakers of English!

Go Speak English offers the possibility for you to find exactly the type of language professional for your requirements, either locally in your own city, or anywhere in the world, 24/7 (24 hours a day, 7 days a week).

On the website you can…

Search for teachers with the characteristics which you are looking for, including:

Accent – for example: British, American, Canadian, South African, Australian, or New Zealand.

Age – you can decide to learn and practise English with a teacher in your age range.

Gender – you can choose to have English lessons with a male or female teacher.

Teaching qualification – you can search for a teacher who has a professional teaching qualification.

Location – you can study face to face with a teacher in the town or city where you study, work, or live.

Time zone – you can choose a teacher in a different time zone so you can have lessons online via Skype at any time of day or night.

Sign Language – you can study either online via Skype using video and written chat text or in the town or city which is most convenient for you.

Search for Language Schools either online or in the town or city where you study, work, or live.

Search for Interpreters of any language to English, in the town or city where you require an interpreting service.

Search for Translators to translate documents or books from any language to English, either online via email or in the town or city where you study, work, or live.

Search for Students (people who want to learn or practise English) or Clients and Companies who require language services including English lessons and courses, interpreting or translation services.
